titleStmt.title: Against the revolt to a foreign jurisdiction, which would be to England its perjury, church-ruine, and slavery in two parts ... / by Richard Baxter ...
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
(from t.p.) I. The history of mens endeavors to introduce it -- II. The confutation of all pretences for it.
